scenarios.blurb: The singer, Angel Aria, has been abducted! The party faces the daunting task of venturing into the Hive where they must confront an infernal street gang that holds the musician captive. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. CONTENT WARNING: Abduction, Alcohol, Imprisonment, Obsession, Social Inequality, Violence.

scenarios.name: PS-DC-HNL-02 The Hungry Prince
scenarios.author: Jonathan Bennett
scenarios.blurb: Tensar's Employment Service has an unusual job for a band of adventurers. At 'The Hungry Prince', a renowned eatery in Sigil, a troublesome rodent issue has arisen. The adventurers are called upon to assist the understaffed ratcatchers of Parakk Pest in tackling this infestation. But as they delve deeper, they may find that in the City of Doors, even a simple pest problem can hide layers of unexpected turns. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. CONTENT WARNING: Avian Cruelty, Cannibalism, Cranium Rats, Mind Control

scenarios.name: PS-DC-HNL-03 Ardragon of Sigil
scenarios.author: Jonathan Bennett
scenarios.blurb:
Ardragon of Sigil (PS-DC-HNL-03)

The Zhentarim Needs Your Help

Corvus Ravenwinter, the newly appointed Ardragon of the Black Network in Sigil, has a job available for adventurers. The job involves finding and returning a wayward noble to their father. How hard can it be?

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. A Dungeoncraft Planescape Adventure set in Sigil, the City of Doors. 

CONTENT WARNING: Addiction Allegory, Body Horror, Demons, Mind Alteration

scenarios.name: PS-DC-MORD-01 Mordenkainen's Memory Palace
scenarios.author: Nick Stefanski
scenarios.blurb: Enter the first demiplane made by the famous archmage, a place woven from the stuff of memories. Here unrealized possibilities take human form to clash with fears and regrets made flesh. Recruit alternate versions of Mordenkainen himself in order to defeat a rogue's gallery of his greatest enemies! A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: fractured memories, regrets made manifest, fiends and the undead

scenarios.name: PS-DC-NBDD-01 The Greatest Gameshow
scenarios.author: Robbie Pleasant
scenarios.blurb: The archmage Paup Quizzem has been bringing his games and trivia challenges to adventurers across the planes since he first made his debut in the ENNIE Award-winning "Where Can She Be?" Each quiz and question has been leading up to this: his ultimate gameshow, offering the ultimate prize. The only question remaining is: who will win it? Travel to Sigil and team up with NPCs from across the North Bay Dungeon Day (NBDD) series of adventures, testing your wits, skills, and knowledge. Everyone is here, from longtime favorites to minor characters, all ready to join your team or take you down to claim the prize. It's time for the greatest gameshow! Are you prepared? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. CONTENT WARNING: Environmental hazard (lava), using familiars like footballs

scenarios.name: PS-DC-RAVENGARD-V Duke Ravengard Gets Sent to Hell (Again)
scenarios.author: Jeremy Cheong
scenarios.blurb: The mighty hero Duke Ravengard returns to hell to face his most dangerous challenge yet: being too famous for his own good. Duke Ravengard Gets Sent to Hell (Again) is a satirical comedic adventure set in the post-Descent into Avernus timeline. Meet Skullcrack Studios, the movie studio that's sending Grand Duke Ulder Ravengard on yet another infernal escapade so they can turn it into this year's summer blockbuster. Our seasoned adventurers must dive head-first into the extraplanar entertainment industry to retrieve the Duke. One thing's for sure: they'll be getting their fifteen minutes of fame whether they like it or not. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 4 Characters. Optimized for APL 18. Content Warning: Unrequited Love/Flirting, Torture, Ritual Sacrifice (Mentions)

scenarios.name: Ravnica Homegame (non-Adventurers League)
scenarios.blurb:
DM's choice of a home game using the Ravnica rules.

Note: This is not run using the Adventurer's League rules, so characters are not portable into or out of this. You are playing using the DM's own purview!

scenarios.name: Salvage Mission: Dino World
scenarios.author: Celeste Conowitch
scenarios.blurb: Explore an abandoned dinosaur theme park in search of your quarry…but beware! Predators of all sorts stalk the crumbling ruins and toppled tourist attractions of Dino World. A 3-4 hour Oracle of War Salvage Mission for Tier 2 characters (optimized for APL 5).

scenarios.name: Salvage Mission: Gulgo-13
scenarios.author: Christian Eichhorn
scenarios.blurb: A 4-5 hour Oracle of War Salvage Mission for Tier 1 characters (optimized for APL 3).

scenarios.name: Salvage Mission: House Hunting
scenarios.author: Fynn Headen
scenarios.blurb: Residential pricing is just insane in Salvation. Why pay anything when you live on the edge of a barren wasteland just full of housing opportunities? A 4-hour Oracle of War Salvage Mission for Tier 1 characters (optimized for APL 3).

scenarios.name: Salvage Mission: Make Your Own Adventure
scenarios.blurb: A salvage mission created using Eberron: Oracle of War: Salvage Bases and Missions.  See below for Duration and Tier.

scenarios.name: SF1 AP 01: Dead Suns, Part 1: Incident at Absalom Station
scenarios.author: Robert G. McCreary
scenarios.blurb:
A Ship Without a Crew

When a brutal gang war breaks out on a docking bay in Absalom Station, the player characters are recruited by the Starfinder Society to investigate the unexpected bloodshed. Delving into the station’s seedy Spike neighborhoods, the heroes confront the gangs and discover that both were paid to start the riot and that the true conflict is between two rival mining companies battling over a new arrival in orbit around the station: a mysteriously deserted ship and the strange asteroid it recovered from the Drift. To head off further violence, the heroes are asked to investigate the ship and discover what happened to its crew, as well as the nature of the asteroid it tows. But what the players find there will set in motion events that could threaten the entirety of the Pact Worlds and change the face of the galaxy forever...

scenarios.name: SF1 AP 02: Dead Suns, Part 2: Temple of the Twelve
scenarios.author: John Compton
scenarios.blurb:
Welcome to the Jungle

Now members of the Starfinder Society and piloting their very own ship, the heroes head to the planet Castrovel, home of some of the best universities in the Pact Worlds, to research the clues they found on the mysterious asteroid called the Drift Rock. On Castrovel, the adventurers' findings point them toward an ancient elven temple-city called the Temple of the Twelve, lost deep within Castrovel's teeming wilderness. But in addition to the dangerous flora and fauna of the jungle, the heroes must contend with two other factions—the exiled Corpse Fleet of Eox and the Cult of the Devourer—who are also interested in the asteroid's secrets and have their own plans for the ancient alien technology behind it, if they can find it first!

scenarios.name: SF1 AP 03: Dead Suns, Part 3: Splintered Worlds
scenarios.author: Amanda Hamon Kunz
scenarios.blurb: Tracking the Cult of the Devourer, the heroes travel to the Diaspora, but they must survive the asteroid field to find the cult’s hidden command post. What they learn there takes the heroes to Eox, where they must challenge the planet's undead inhabitants to learn that the Devourer cult is headed for a distant star system in search of clues to the location of an alien superweapon.

scenarios.name: SF1 AP 04: Dead Suns, Part 4: The Ruined Clouds
scenarios.author: Jason Keeley
scenarios.blurb: Still on the heels of the Devourer cult, the heroes head to a distant, uncharted star system, where they find the ruins of an ancient alien city floating in the atmosphere of a gas giant. Exploring the ruins, they encounter the degenerate descendants of a highly advanced species that once controlled the alien superweapon the heroes are searching for. Through the legends and superstitions of these savage aliens, the heroes can piece together clues to the superweapon's hidden location and the key to unlocking its power—an impossibly huge megastructure that the Cult of the Devourer is intent on seizing!

scenarios.name: SF1 AP 05: Dead Suns, Part 5: The Thirteenth Gate
scenarios.author: Stephen Radney-MacFarland
scenarios.blurb: The heroes journey deeper into the Vast to the Gate of Twelve Suns, an alien megastructure incorporating no fewer than a dozen stars. They must explore the vast construction to learn how to open a portal to the demiplane that contains the alien superweapon they have been seeking, but the heroes must contend with the Cult of the Devourer for control of the alien technology. Only by finally defeating the cult can the heroes keep the superweapon out of the wrong hands—though the cult is far from the only threat facing the heroes.

scenarios.name: SF1 AP 06: Dead Suns, Part 6: Empire of Bones
scenarios.author: Owen K.C. Stephens
scenarios.blurb: The undead Corpse Fleet has appeared in orbit above the Gate of Twelve Suns, intent on seizing the ancient alien superweapon called the Stellar Degenerator. Massively outgunned, the heroes' only hope lies in infiltrating the fleet's flagship and seizing control of the vessel's bridge. Only then can the heroes set the ship to self-destruct and pilot it on a collision course with the superweapon. If successful, the heroes can destroy the Stellar Degenerator, but they'll need to escape the destruction to live to tell the tale!

scenarios.name: Shadow of the Demon Lord Introduction
scenarios.blurb:
An introduction to the Shadow of the Demon Lord RPG.

Enter a world on the brink of annihilation, its lands torn asunder by war, plague, and ancient horrors. Urth, the world of Shadow of the Demon Lord, is one of many imperiled by the shadowy menace lurking without and in this game you can play through its final days as embattled survivors fighting against what to many seems to be an inevitable end. A complete role playing game in one book, Shadow contains everything you need to create characters to confront the hordes of demons spilling in from the Void and to create and play through exciting stories steeped in horror and violence.

scenarios.name: SJA-01 Orientation
scenarios.author: Will Doyle
scenarios.blurb:
This adventure, designed for three to seven 1st-level characters, is the first in a series of four adventures. It is set in Spelljammer Academy on the island of Nimbral, many miles southwest of the Chultan peninsula in the Forgotten Realms campaign setting.

At some events, these adventures might use a code to be identified more easily. The code for this adventure is SJA-01.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-ANGKA-02 The Pursuit of Happiness
scenarios.author: Johann Taslim
scenarios.blurb:
A young scholar has found the location of the fabled Philosopher's Stone.
She is now looking for adventurers to accompany her on the expedition to find it.
Will you answer the call?

A Four-Hour adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

Content Warning: body horror (mentions), death (of a loved one, mentions mass murder), gore, mental health (grief, trauma)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-ANGKA-03 Shipwrecked in the Sea of Madness
scenarios.author: Johann Taslim
scenarios.blurb:
When a spelljammer ship is dragged into a wormhole, the worst thing that could happen is to be far-flung and end up in an entirely different space system.
But not all wormholes are the same, especially not the one you encountered.
Shipwrecked in a strange, alien location, can you even hope to escape?

A Two-Hour eldritch horror survival adventure for Tier 1 characters. Optimized for APL 3.

Content Warning: Gore (Blood, Dismemberment), Horror (Eldritch, Body, Eye, Teeth), Mental Health (Madness)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-ANGKA-05 Never Let Me Go
scenarios.author: Johann Taslim
scenarios.blurb:
The Angkaspace has become increasingly unstable of late. Spelljamming ships have disappeared when they en-route between planets. Rumors of an ancient evil, long dormant but now reawakened, have spread like wildfire, striking fear into the hearts of those who call Angkaspace home. A call has been put out for all daring souls to embark on a quest and brave the dangers of the unknown to stop this evil from spreading further.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13.

Content Warning: death of a loved one, mental health (grief, trauma)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-ANGKA-06 Moving Up in the World
scenarios.author: Johann Taslim
scenarios.blurb:
At the outermost regions of Angkaspace, there has been a surge in pirate attacks targeting spelljamming vessels carrying merchants and travelers. If left unchecked, this growing threat has the potential to disrupt the economic and social stability of Angkaspace.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BAD-01 Bad Omen
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets, Arthur Marques
scenarios.blurb: Tensions are high on the Rock of Bral. Someone wants the Rock to be bathed in blood, and the Red Masks need you to prevent it. Time is of the essence. The public hearing is tonight! A 2-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. Content Warnings: abuse (stolen memories), environment (sewers), gore, imprisonment, mentioned (prejudiced NPC)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BAD-02 Space Hamsterball Run!
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb: It's the day of the big race on the Rock of Bral, but all of the riders are missing or incapacitated. Can you step in to save the Space Hamsterball Run? A 2-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. Content Warnings: Consensual Animal Racing

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BAD-03 Festival of Frun
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets, Arthur Marques
scenarios.blurb: Another year of faction feuding has gone by on the Rock of Bral, so it's time to put down the weapons, do some stretches, and prepare for fisticuffs at the FESTIVAL OF FRUN. A 2-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. Content Warnings: Consensual Animal Riding

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BST-01 Slammed
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb: Join Captain Raptor and the crew of the Merry Mary on an Astral Fishing Extravanganza! Learn how to fish for astral urchins, and fend off creatures eying your catch! Sounds simple enough, but when another spelljamming ship appears the trip begins to go sideways. Will astral urchin fishing be a hit, or will you be Slammed in the Asteroidbow? A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Mentions (Coercion, Gambling)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BST-02 Rammed
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb: Astral urchin fishing is taking off, and President Yeti ordered a new spelljamming ship. Bringing the ship home seems like a simple mission until you arrive at the shipyard to find it's been Rammed by the Space Dwarves' Monstrous Hammerhead! Clear the shipyard of monsters, rescue survivors, and figure out where President's new ship is! A Two-Hour Adventures for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Electrocution

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BST-03 Taken in the Early Morning
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb: Captain Raptor returned from an astral fishing trip to find Bigfoot's Big Fish was ransacked. President Yeti is in a funk, and his translator is missing. Help Captain Raptor put the business back together then search for clues about the missing Slatter. Was he Taken in the Early Morning? A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Abduction

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BST-04 Blasted
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb: Slatter Tran has been kidnapped, and you're going to get him back! Evidence suggests he was Taken in the Early Morning to a secret tower deep in the Asteroidbow. Infiltrate the nasty wizard Nicolli's secret tower to rescue him on President Yeti's behalf! Part 2 of the 2 part Better Slatter than Never storyline A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Bully, Imprisonment

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BST-05 Pounded
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb: Times are not the best in Bestspace. A string of robberies have left hearts stolen across the Wildspace System. The Bestspace Navy has learned of a grave danger. The giff warlord Godfried and his partner the nasty wizard Nicolli converted a massive asteroid mining rig into a colossal battle station, the Giffstar. Armed with a terrifyingly large energy weapon, the Giffstar poses a threat to all of Bestspace. Will heroes rise up to eliminate the threat, or will the party end up Pounded on the Deck by the Giff's Big Gun. Part 1 of the 2 part Assault on the Giffstar storyline. A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Extreme Environment (Large Scale Battlefield), Sexual Innuendo, Terrorism (Property Bombing)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BST-06 Come Together on the Giffstar
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb: Times are not the best in Bestspace. A string of robberies have left hearts stolen across the Wildspace System. The Bestspace Navy has learned of a grave danger. The giff warlord Godfried and his partner the nasty wizard Nicolli converted a massive asteroid mining rig into a colossal battle station, the Giffstar. Armed with a terrifyingly large energy weapon, the Giffstar poses a threat to all of Bestspace. Having infiltrated the Giffstar in Pounded on the Deck by the Giff's Big Gun. It's time to Come Together On the Giffstar and put an end to this once and for all! Part 2 of the 2 part Assault on the Giffstar storyline. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Bullying, Imperialism, Poisoning

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BST-07 Tying the Knot
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb: President Yeti and Slatter Tran are finally getting married! On the day of the wedding, Tommy Twotoes has a bad feeling he just can't shake. Help Tommy relax by ensuring nothing bad happens! The epilogue to the Bestspace Cycle. A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. CONTENT WARNING: food poisoning, manipulation, potential civilian death

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-BST-08 Enter: Mission
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb: Do you feel like dancing? Too bad! Captain Raptor's vacation crew arrives at Planetsaurus Rex only to discover that Club Dino's heart has been stolen, and the dance competition postponed! Enter: Mission to return the club's heart and win the competition! A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Adverse Environment (allergens), Capitalism, Mentions (humanoid zoo)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-CJK01-01 A Whale of a Time
scenarios.author: Chironjeev Kanjilal
scenarios.blurb: A lone kindori has been spotted resting at the edge of Gleamspace and it has not moved for several days. Is this a sign of poachers returning to the system, or perhaps an indication of something worse? People are curious and worried, and someone has put forward the funds for an investigative party. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. CONTENT WARNING: whale hunting/poaching (mention)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-CJK02 The Tavern at the End of the Wildspace
scenarios.author: Chironjeev Kanjilal
scenarios.blurb: It’s a period of downtime for the adventurers in The Tavern at the End of the Wildspace, an interdimensional, planes-hopping pub. Really, that's it, I swear! Get to know the tavern and its people, take in the atmosphere, and participate in a series of episodic and light-hearted encounters. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. Content Warning: Alcohol (excessive drinking, tavern/pub environs)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-CONMAR-01 Who Killed Marcus?
scenarios.author: Christian Alhaug, Martine Lassen
scenarios.blurb: When a spelljammer crashed near Oar’s Rest, Marcus vanished. Where could the kid be? A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. Part 1 of the Saving Marcus Tetralogy CONTENT WARNING: Disease, Kidnapping

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-CONMAR-02 A Kraken Good Story
scenarios.author: Christian Alhaug, Martine Lassen
scenarios.blurb: The map is hidden in the lair of a kraken and is there for the taking. It’s been said before, BUT THIS could be greatest adventure ever told! A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. Part 2 of the Saving Marcus Tetralogy CONTENT WARNING: Drowning, Kidnapping

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-CONMAR-03 Heart of Shards
scenarios.author: Christian Alhaug, Martine Lassen
scenarios.blurb: As your dragonship is pulled towards the black hole, you realize this is your one chance to save Marcus (and yourself)! A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. Part 3 of the Saving Marcus Tetralogy CONTENT WARNING: Emptiness of Space, Kidnapping

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-CONMAR-04 Finally Saving Marcus
scenarios.author: Christian Alhaug, Martine Lassen
scenarios.blurb: Adventurers have tried for years, but finally, the mystery behind Marcus’ illness has been uncovered. Now it is up to you to save him. At last. A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. The conclusion of the Saving Marcus Tetralogy CONTENT WARNING: Kidnapping, Child Endangerment

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DD-01 Rock Paper Pistols
scenarios.author: Martine Lassen, Steve Hill
scenarios.blurb: You’ve found yourselves in possession of a lockbox full of secrets – secrets to die for. Can you unravel the truth before those who want it come calling? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. Content Warning: Loss of a parent Episode 1 of Ad Astra

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DD-02 Lone Survivors
scenarios.author: Daniel Chapman, Lex Winter
scenarios.blurb: When a routine salvage mission takes a sudden, deadly turn, you have to wonder: In Wildspace, will anyone hear you scream? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. Content Warning: Abduction, auditory hallucinations, body horror (transformation) Episode 2 of Ad Astra

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DD-03 Castles in the Sand
scenarios.author: Jason Lee, Steven Truong
scenarios.blurb: When a fragment of the Monad surfaces at a tropical resort, it’s time to stow away your armor, put on your bathing suits, and hit the beach! For once, fun in the sun’s part of the job description. Just don’t let those sea monsters crash your party! A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. Content Warning: Possible phobia triggers (tentacles, beaches, oceans) Episode 3 of Ad Astra

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DD-04 The Highest Bidder
scenarios.author: Jamie Chan, Shu Qing Tan
scenarios.blurb: The race to claim a fragment of the Monad from a prestigious intergalactic auction house plunges you into a deadly web of lies and intrigue. With four other factions vying for the prize, can you rise to the occasion, or will the fall of the hammer spell your defeat? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. Content Warning: Bullying, classism, religious proselytism, treachery Episode 4 of Ad Astra

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DD-05 The Show Must Go On
scenarios.author: Robbie Pleasant, Addy Tortosa
scenarios.blurb: The Monad has taken you to a most unexpected destination: a derelict theater floating in Wildspace. Can you put on a show that brings peace to the unquiet dead? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. Content Warning: Death Episode 5 of Ad Astra

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DD-06 The Prime Strikers
scenarios.author: Michelle Churchill, Luís Ricardo
scenarios.blurb: When a nefarious bounty has the Kyriakos stymied, they approach you with an offer you can ill refuse. The hunt is on in The Prime’s fog shrouded streets, but there is also danger at every turn. Can you win through? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. Content Warning: Abuse (Charm/Mind Control), Alcohol, Hospital (Injuries from Terrorism), Possible Phobia Triggers (Clowns, Rodents, Spelljammer Crash) Episode 6 of Ad Astra

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DD-07 Sinaya's Song
scenarios.author: Brian Balagot
scenarios.blurb: An abandoned research facility on a desolate ocean planet harbors technology coveted by the Ordo Melioris, and a vital clue to the Monad’s origins. It’s a race against time to fortify The Forge against the zealots’ forces! Can you weather the siege? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. Content Warning: Crashing ships, sentience vs life, weapons of mass destruction Episode 7 of Ad Astra

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DD-08 Blast from the Past
scenarios.author: Jeremy Cheong
scenarios.blurb: You’ve been sent to Azan Station in search of a spark, but things won’t be that easy. Glimpse the past and unearth the station’s tragedy in this time-travelling adventure. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. Content Warning: Dismemberment, Flashbacks to Violence

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DD-09 The Huangfu Heist
scenarios.author: Jason Koh, Darryl Ho
scenarios.blurb: A glitzy Wildspace gala on a glamorous pleasure cruise, a dozen priceless relics, and one chance to steal it all. Are you in, or out? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. Content Warning: Alcohol, Fantasy Violence, Gambling, Tobacco Use

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DEN-H4 Departure from Fallen Stars
scenarios.author: Dennis R Hall
scenarios.blurb:
Many heroic souls are trapped as trophies within the Reef of Living Memory - an Astral Domain of Sekolah, sahuagin God of the Hunt. Before attempting their liberation, you must find a way to get to a place no one in their right mind would want to go.

Into the Jaws of History Series: Part 1 of 3.

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

CONTENT WARNING: Bone Collecting, Bounty Hunting, Soul Imprisonment.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-DWR-01 Dohwar Heist
scenarios.author: Brendon Watson
scenarios.blurb: On the Rock of Bral the dohwar of the Silver Beak merchant cartel are feeling the squeeze as the mercane are moving in on their turf. To make matters worse a recent raid by vampirates has resulted in the loss of the secret production facilities for their most lucrative trade commodity, sweet honeyfish mooncakes. With time running out the dohwar require adventurers with a particular set of skills to infiltrate the vampirate stronghold, liberate the valuable cargo and get out without drawing too much heat. Sounds simple enough right? But what waits in the hidden vault for our intrepid heroes, and could they be biting off more than they can chew? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Alcohol, Drowning, Fantasy Violence, Kidnapping

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-ECHO-01 Starfall
scenarios.author: Mike Arrow
scenarios.blurb: Githyanki pirates have raided the Hesperides Temple and made off with a sacred relic. Can you retrieve the lost item before time runs out? A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. Content warning: Death (fire), possible phobia trigger (spiders)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-FLUMPH-01 Flurry of Flumphs
scenarios.author: Steven Truong
scenarios.blurb:
The Flumphs’ pilgrimage to the Fluxspace, a location of religious fervor to the benign psionics, is being studied by an eccentric professor. You are hired by the Blackstaff tower to keep him safe and enjoy the majesty of the unique wildspace.    

Story 1 of the Flumph Fantasy Trilogy

A Two-Hour Spelljammer Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.


CONTENT ADVISORY: Attempted Poaching, Eldritch Horrors, Jellyfish & Tentacles (Phobia), Space and Astral Sea Travel.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC Happy New Year!
scenarios.author: Bird Bird
scenarios.blurb:
Welcome, one and all, to the grandest event of the year! Join residents of the Rock of Bral and beyond in ushering in the new year with a festive celebration in the stars. 

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8

Content Warning: Spiders

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-IGC-ECP-01 Stoneheart
scenarios.author: Rob Froberg
scenarios.blurb: Astronomers have spotted a rogue asteroid made entirely of dense materials heading for the Rock of Bral. Unearth the secrets buried within the stony core, where ancient elemental forces stir and threaten to reshape the cosmos. Part I of the Elemental Cosmic Power Pentalogy A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. CONTENT WARNING: Collision of Celestial Bodies, Threat of Loss of Innocent Lives, and Threat of Widespread Civilization Destruction

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-IGC-ECP-02 Coldsnap
scenarios.author: Rob Froberg
scenarios.blurb: A second asteroid has been sighted-this one consisting of seemingly solid ice. Can its course be altered, or will the Rock of Bral be left out in the cold? Part II of the Elemental Cosmic Power Pentalogy A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. CONTENT WARNING: Collision of Celestial Bodies, Threat of Loss of Innocent Lives, and Threat of Widespread Civilization Destruction

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-IGC-ECP-03 Conflagration
scenarios.author: Rob Froberg
scenarios.blurb: A third asteroid with a nimbus of fire barrels toward the Rock of Bral. Will it destroy all life there, or will heroes rise to meet the scathing temperatures? Part III of the Elemental Cosmic Power Pentalogy A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. CONTENT WARNING: Collision of Celestial Bodies, Threat of Loss of Innocent Lives, and Threat of Widespread Civilization Destruction

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-ISL-01 Speck in the Sky
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb:
This light-hearted adventure takes place on the morning of the giff holiday Revery.
The crew of Her Majesty are on course to be late to the festivities.
Help captain Reginald find the stragglers from his crew,
including Speck the space hamster who has plans of her own.
Then join the giff in this explosive celebration!

CONTENT WARNING: Capitalism, Disease (food poisoning), Severe Environment (Fireworks
Display, Wildspace)

A festive two-hour adventure for Tier 1 characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-KGV-01 Moonlit Mysteries: A Heist to Remember
scenarios.author: Hunter Sinclair
scenarios.blurb: As the Feast of the Moon draws near in Starhaven, murder shatters the celestial celebrations, and a mystery unfolds with the heist of a priceless artifact. It's a riddle only a supreme detective could untangle — but in a time and place where legends walk the line between life and death, who's playing a part, and who's playing for keeps? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Death, Tentacles, Ghosts, Speak with the dead, Heights, Water/Ocean

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-LEGIT-SB-01 Fire Thieves
scenarios.author: Jeremy Cheong
scenarios.blurb:
There's a mega-bounty on the Macguffin, and a gang of pirates is en-route to claim it — but not if you can steal it from them first!

Part 1 of the Suncorp's Bounty series.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 characters. Optimized for APL 8.

Fire Thieves has your PCs infiltrating the Sunkiller, the infamous pirate ship crewed by the Crack of Dawn. The goal is simple: sneak in, stealthily take out as much of the crew, grab the Macguffin, and when the alarm is inevitably sounded, flee or fight your way out.

A quick firing heist-themed adventure in the Spelljammer setting.
Explore the Crack of Dawn's high-tech vessel.
Face a fully fleshed-out and illustrated crew.
Take out your foes creatively — or just use good ol'fashioned violence.
Two possible endings, plus an optional appendix for a third.
Includes a high-resolution map for VTT play.
Content Warning: Death (Allied), Explosives, Electrocution, Late-Stage Capitalism

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-LEGIT-SB-02 Club Diamond
scenarios.author: Jeremy Cheong
scenarios.blurb: You need to steal the Macguffin back?! Enter Club Diamond, rub shoulders with its mega-rich patrons, and get past its well-protected vault to reclaim the prize. Part 2 of the Suncorp's Bounty series. A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. Content Warning: Workplace Abuse, Alcohol. Gun and Police Violence

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-LEGIT-SB-03 Mergers and Acquisitions
scenarios.author: Jeremy Cheong
scenarios.blurb: The Macguffin's fallen into the wrong hands. Now the world will end... unless you can reach a shareholder's meeting and block the resolution that will destroy the sun. Part 3 of the Suncorp's Bounty series. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13. Content Warning: Disaster (Cosmic Disaster, Mass Panic)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-LNS-01 Spelljammer of the Damned
scenarios.author: Steven Truong
scenarios.blurb:
Tier 2 (2-Hour DungeonCraft, Spelljammer) 

It is Liar’s Night Eve, and the Candy King needs your help! A supply of sweets for the children and revelers of Faerun has been waylaid deep in the Astral Sea at the edge of Doomspace. 

A Two to Four Hour Spooktacular Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

 Adventure by Steven Truong

CONTENT ADVISORY: Arachnophobia (Spiders), Captivity, Coulrophobia (Clowns), Hemophobia (Blood), Horror and Halloween Themes, Musophobia (Rat), Eldritch Horrors, Vampires, Isolation, Space and Sea Travel, Torture references.

Adventure by Steven Truong

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-LP-01 Litter Patrol
scenarios.author: Rick Way
scenarios.blurb:
Travel the Astral Sea in search of salvage! Explore the expanse while cleaning up the messes and threats others have left behind.

A Four-Hour Adventure for 5th-10th level characters. Optimized for APL 8.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-MB06-ATFT A Taste For Trouble
scenarios.author: Matt Brown
scenarios.blurb: A chef finds himself facing a dire situation as his once-thriving business dwindles due to a cunning rival. Gripped by a growing suspicion of malicious play, he seeks the aid of intrepid adventurers, urging them to uncover the web of deceit and illegal practices that lie beneath the surface. A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. CONTENT WARNING: Animal cruelty

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-MONSTER-01 Phoenix
scenarios.author: Steven Truong
scenarios.blurb:
A druid grove of wildfire is in peril; their guardian elemental has gone rogue!

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13.

Adventure by Steven Truong

CONTENT ADVISORY: Pyrophobia (Fire), Ophidiophobia (Snakes), Space Travel.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-NBDD-01 Where in the Worlds?
scenarios.author: Robbie Pleasant
scenarios.blurb:
Carmille Santiago strikes again!
The long-requested, long-awaited follow-up to the award-winning Where Can She Be? is here. Carmille Santiago has stolen a spelljamming ship and escaped into Wildspace - now it's up to you to track her down!

Explore Wildspace, discover new and classic systems, and collect the clues to see where Carmille's next heist has taken her. Danger awaits in the depths of space, but if you can put the pieces together, you can still save the day.

A four-hour Dungeoncraft adventure for levels 5-10.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-NMB1-01 An Enemy
scenarios.author: N. M. Brickle
scenarios.blurb:
A rogue illithid joins Spelljammer Academy and brings a new idea with her. A ship is being designed but it needs some testing. This is where you come in…

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 5.

CONTENT WARNING: Drowning

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-NMB1-02 Kindred Spirits
scenarios.author: N. M. Brickle
scenarios.blurb: ANCIENT ARTIFACTS are hidden all over the multiverse. One such item lies DEEP BENEATH THE WAVES on a water-world in REALMSPACE. A rogue mind flayer, named ESTRIN, believes this may be a remnant from an ancient race. With the help of SPELLJAMMER ACADEMY, the illithid has drawn up some blueprints for a SPELLJAMMER SHIP called the An Enemy. A prototype has been evaluated by brave heroes at the academy, revealing a need for a special part that will allow the space anemone ship to survive intense pressure. The ROCK OF BRAL is a hub of trade among other things where anything can be acquired for the right price. TWO BROTHERS run a successful scrap shop and should have the part that Estrin requires. Unfortunately, upon arrival there seems to be something wrong, and the terms of the deal have changed. With the price soaring drastically, the mind flayer has put a call out for anyone willing to help find the underlying cause of this. A 2-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 6.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-NMB1-03 Conclusion in Karpri
scenarios.author: N. M. Brickle
scenarios.blurb: A rogue illithid is on the cusp of a great discovery. An ancient artifact hides beneath the waves of a water-world. Will you brave the icy conditions and immense pressure for the pursuit of knowledge, gold, and glory? A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 7. CONTENT WARNING: Claustrophobia, Isolation, Drowning

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-PAT-00 The Moonshot
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb:
If you've got one shot, make it The Moonshot!

Secure a crashed spelljammer and take it to the Rock of Bral - if you can make it in one piece!

A two-hour adventure for Tier 1 characters. Optimized for APL 2.

CONTENT WARNING: Mind Control (Robots), Vehicle Crash (Spelljammer Ship)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-PAT-02 Snake-Eye Satellite
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb:
Ral'Astra, the captain of the Moonshot discovers a hidden star map on a piece of pottery she purchased at an Astral auction. She hires you to investigate...

A two-hour adventure for Tier 2 characters. Optimized for APL 8.

CONTENT WARNING: Entrapment, Hazardous Fumes, Phobia (Snakes)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-PHP-FLN01-01 Forlorn but not Forgotten
scenarios.author: Franz Bedonia
scenarios.blurb: You are called to the Wildspace system of Forlorn where an astral elf requests your aid! Will you help him seek out his lost lover? Part One of the Crystalstar Series A 2-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. CONTENT WARNING: Abduction (possible), Loss and Mourning (of a Loved one), Strangulation

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-ROCK-01 Turmoil in Bral
scenarios.author: Arthur Marques
scenarios.blurb: Two major factions of the Rock of Bral are on the brink of civil war while something wicked brews in the city sewers. A roleplaying-focused adventure that puts the adventurers in the middle of the complex politics of the Rock of Bral. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 characters. Optimized for APL 8.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-SQD2 Squidoosh!
scenarios.author: Brian Balagot
scenarios.blurb:
A wishing star was recently seen streaking in the skies above Alphaspace. Everyone wants to reach it and make their dreams come true. Squidalina wants to use this wish to save everyone she knows from vanishing. Can you help her reach the star before everybody else?

CONTENT WARNING: Fantasy Violence, Heights (Space Travel)

A two-hour adventure for Tier 1 characters.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-SQD Squidaddle!
scenarios.author: Brian Balagot
scenarios.blurb:
A sentient starsquid was caught in the net of a fishing vessel you hitched a ride on to get to Alphaspace. She wants to get back home to Squidlantis in the Great Asteroid Reef.

Can you protect Squidalina from ink-redible dangers and bring her home?
Squidaddle! is a two-hour family-friendly Spelljammer adventure for characters of levels 1-4.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-THID-MB04 The Horror in Darkfall
scenarios.author: Matt Brown
scenarios.blurb:
The remote asteroid town of Darkfall harbors a terrible secret.

In this adventure characters will have the opportunity to reveal the mystery behind the strange occurrences that have been plaguing the residents.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

CONTENT WARNING: Abduction, Sacrifice, Horror

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-TKM-01 Lost Stars
scenarios.author: Tricia Monsod
scenarios.blurb:
You are onboard the maiden voyage of the Coalition’s first exploration ship. As the ship departs, it receives a distress signal from a cold desert planet and you are tasked to investigate it.

Will your first mission with this organization be a success?

Part 1 of the Lost Generations Series

A Two-Hour Spelljammer Dungeoncraft Adventure for Level 1-4 Characters. Optimized for Average Party Level (APL) 3.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-TKM-02 Tink, Tink, Boom!
scenarios.author: Tricia Monsod
scenarios.blurb:
Another distress signal hails the N-T3RPR153 to the planet of Skog Wats where the mechanical forest is full of broken machinery. Will you be able to locate the signal bearer and make this rescue mission a success?

Part 2 of the Lost Generations Series

A Two-Hour Adventure for Level 1-4 Characters. Optimized for Average Party Level (APL) 3.

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-TRIDEN-MW Mighty Wings
scenarios.author: Brian Balagot
scenarios.blurb:
Mighty Wings Academy has identified you to be in the top 1% of spelljammer candidates and invited you to join the advanced spelljammer airship program. Master Astral Combat Maneuvers, fly 100x faster than the average spelljammer ship, and compete with the best of the best.

Mighty Wings is a four-hour adventure for tier 1 characters.

CONTENT WARNING: Passing Out in a Vehicle, New Ship Combat Mechanics, Training Evaluation

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-TRIDEN-SD Shot in The Dark
scenarios.author: Shane Hogan, Triden Games
scenarios.blurb: A monstrous horror threatens the very existence of a heavily populated space station. Their only hope for survival... The power of Rock! This adventure takes place in a region of Wildspace known as Trayah space. A threat of catastrophic proportions bears down upon our beloved Waystation. It's time to crank the volume up to twelve and blast this creature back into Wildspace in this fun, exciting, 80's rock-themed adventure. A Two- to Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. Content Warning: Alcohol Use

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-VEN-01 S.O.S.
scenarios.author: Christian Brazil
scenarios.blurb:
A stormwrecked ship lost in space. Are there any survivors? Can you bring them back home?

A two-hour adventure designed for 1st to 4th-level characters
Optimized for APL 3

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-VMT-01 Waterdeep: Statue Heist
scenarios.author: Mitchell Tee
scenarios.blurb:
The walking statues of Waterdeep have been stolen and taken to space! Can you get them back and apprehend the mastermind behind this dastardly plot, all before the Open Lord returns? Explore Realmspace and defeat mighty adversaries as you embark on a grand hunt for the Hawk Man, Sahuagin Humbled, Honorable Knight, and God Catcher statues.

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 3 Characters. Optimized for APL 13.
CONTENT WARNING: possible phobia trigger (spiders)

scenarios.name: SJ-DC-VMT-02 Lonesome Grub
scenarios.author: Mitchell Tee
scenarios.blurb:
Pushing horns weren't easy like the Lore bards said it was. Join an interstellar cattle drive through clown infested space in this cow rustlin', bronc buckin', chicken pickin' Spelljammer Western. Two old Spelljammers need cowhands for one final adventure. Can you see their herd safely out of Realmspace and across the Astral Sea?

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

CONTENT WARNING: death (falling), possible phobia trigger (clowns)

scenarios.name: Starfinder Society (GM's Choice)
scenarios.blurb: Starfinder Society adventure to be determined by DM when everyone gathers.

scenarios.name: Star Wars Edge of the Empire Demo
scenarios.game_system: Star Wars: Edge of the Empire
scenarios.blurb:
Come see a demo of the new Fantasy Flight Star Wars game! This system lets you experience the action from the movies as a devious smuggler, dastardly bounty hunter, a wise jedi, or a plucky droid! Or come up with a new role, what type of character do you wish you saw in the movies?

This session is geared to teaching you the system, so just bring your imagination as our DM will show you what you need to play!

scenarios.name: The Fey Sisters’ Fate
scenarios.author: Chris Doyle
scenarios.blurb: The cries of battle echo in the rustic wilderness, as a pair of fey sisters defend the ancient Briarwood against invaders. When the town of Bur Hollow sends militia men to support their fey allies, they disappear without a trace. The adventurers must enter the Briarwood and save them!

scenarios.name: Vecna: Nest of the Eldritch Eye
scenarios.author: Christopher Perkins, Makenzie De Armas
scenarios.blurb: Vecna: Nest of the Eldritch Eye is a fifth edition Dungeons & Dragons adventure for four to six characters of level 3. This adventure takes place in the city of Neverwinter on the Sword Coast. A sinister cult has crept into the city's bowels, and the characters must infiltrate the cult's hideout and root out its members before harm befalls the city. A Two- to Three-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ABC-01 One Last Time
scenarios.author: Apple Cruz
scenarios.blurb:
It has been a little over seven years since Sylas last saw his wife Rue, the herbalist of the quaint village of Parnast, after she went into the Weathercote Woods one morning to gather supplies for her apothecary. After languishing in silence all these years, Sylas, now on his deathbed, asks adventurers to venture through the mysterious world of the fey in the hopes of learning her true fate, and maybe see her one last time.

A 2- to 4-hour adventure for 5th-10th level characters.
Optimized for: APL 8 @ 5 PCs.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-AMQ-04 Brew me a favor
scenarios.author: Arthur Marques
scenarios.blurb:
Auntie Deadsleep and Betty Big Trouble have been lonely for too long. It's time to assemble a new coven!

The two hags are in need of adventurers for interviewing a promising candidate, the charming Bea Bramble.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

CONTENT ADVISORY: death (murder)

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-AMQ-05 The Dungeon of Smelly Doom
scenarios.author: Arthur Marques
scenarios.blurb:
All sorts of tiny animals in the feywild have gone missing. It was not clear why, but to rescue them, adventurers must face the Dungeon of Smelly Doom!

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

Content advisory:
animal cruelty (entrapment), environmental hazards (water),
kidnapping, phobia (suffocation), phobia (confined spaces)

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ANDL-01 The Petrified Forest
scenarios.author: Brian Balagot
scenarios.blurb:
You have been called to the City of Eshpurta to investigate, and hopefully reverse, the rapid death of all plant-life in the region. Adventurers of your renown should be able to solve this problem before it spreads to the rest of the Sword Coast, and puts the region into a state of horrific famine.

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ANDL-02 The Bleeding Veil
scenarios.author: Brian Balagot
scenarios.blurb:
The discovery of the thin veil between Amn and the fey domain of Andelein has demonstrated how fragile Amn’s economy and food supply are against the whims of the archfey, Alindaya. Adventurers of your renown must go into the Feywild, figure out what is causing this “thin veil”, and bring stability to the lives of the citizens of Amn. Part two of the Thin Veil Series.

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

CONTENT WARNING: Famine, Environmental Disaster, Memory Loss, Curses, Forced Execution

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ANDL-03 The Crossings of Fate
scenarios.author: Brian Balagot
scenarios.blurb:
The planar distortions in Andelein are reaching its zenith! Dare you venture beyond the Feywild’s borders to confront the source? The final part, and thrilling conclusion, to the Thin Veil Trilogy.

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

CONTENT WARNING: Natural Calamities, Possession, Despair, Death, Serpents, Crustaceans

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ARCON-01 The Multivertshus
scenarios.author: Martine Lassen
scenarios.blurb:
You know how it goes: “You’re in a tavern…” But what a tavern!
At the Multivertshus, anything (and everything) can (and will) happen.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

CONTENT WARNING: alcohol (mention), poverty

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ARCON-02 Way of the Wedding
scenarios.author: Daniel Ellingsen
scenarios.blurb:
This is a 2-hour adventure where your choices will have an impact on the story. You choose at the start of the adventure which of three characters you want to help, and their personalities will affect how you act with the adventure. As the adventure is written, there are three possible endings with minor changes to reflect your actions during this adventure.

The adventure takes place inside a domain only reachable through dreams, you and your fellow companions sett out to help a suitor to ask the archfey for their hand in marriage. But to get there you have to pass through a maze filled with wounderous challenges.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ARCON-03 A Forest of Memories
scenarios.author: Martine Lassen
scenarios.blurb:
A caravan is attacked and afterward, someone is behaving strangely.
There’s probably nothing to do about that…

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

CONTENT WARNING: memory loss, possible phobia trigger (spiders)

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ARCON-04 The Multivertshus II
scenarios.author: Martine Lassen
scenarios.blurb: A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. You’re no longer just in a tavern, you’re in charge of it! At the Multivertshus, anything (and everything) can (and will) happen. CONTENT WARNING: alcohol

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-BERRY-00 Berry Note
scenarios.author: Michelle Churchill
scenarios.blurb:
Characters are asked to accompany a young girl as she fetches her little sister who has been berry picking on an island. It would be a simple task if the island in question wasn’t Luskan’s Cutlass Island.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 7.

CONTENT WARNING: Kidnapping, Fire, Charmed Effects, Sleep Deprivation.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-CG-01 Puzzlement in the Potager
scenarios.author: Claire Gellner
scenarios.blurb:
You are lost in a miniature wood in the Feywild. To leave requires a special potion. But what secrets hide between the mushrooms and tea cups?

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-CONMAR-01 Many Happy Returns
scenarios.author: Martine Lassen, Christian Alhaug
scenarios.blurb:
The children of Oar’s Rest have gone missing and it’s up to you to get them back,
but what’s that about a party?

A 4-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-CONMAR-02 Karl Rising
scenarios.author: Casper Akto Kanstrup, Martin Akto Kanstrup
scenarios.blurb:
In the Domain of Marocaro, a giant by the name of Karl has fallen asleep in a sacred grove. This is a usual occurrence, but he has started to have nightmares that have manifested in the grove. For some reason, Karl can’t be woken up and desperate fey creatures have traveled to the Material Plane to try and get help.

Four-Hour Season 11 Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-CONMAR-03 Ballad of Bullywug Bog
scenarios.author: Daniel Ellingsen
scenarios.blurb:
Traveling to a mystical realm to help find some lost objects, the characters find more trouble brewing in the south-eastern
swamp. Do they find what they were looking for, or do they get more than they bargained for?
A Four -Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-CONMAR-04 A Pleasure Cruise
scenarios.author: Karianne Fog Heen
scenarios.blurb: Getting a free ticket to the pleasure boat Casper’s Gambit, the characters discover that Luck is an unreliable patron. And is there any such thing as a free ticket? A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 7. CONTENT WARNING: Gambling, superstition

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-CONMAR-05 Death by Chocolate
scenarios.author: Karianne Fog Heen, Sandra Hovland
scenarios.blurb:
The villagers of Oar’s Rest are in an uproar. The last chocolate delivery is running late, and the sweet shop had to close! Brave adventurers are needed to solve this sweet crisis.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

CONTENT WARNING: Chocolate, fudge, candy

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-CONMAR-06 Two Hearts Apart
scenarios.author: Shu Qing Tan
scenarios.blurb: Your friend is kidnapped on their wedding day. Can you save them? Strange beings whisked your friend away to an unknown fey realm and you join forces with their fiancé to rescue them. Travel to an otherworldy place where you must use your might, your wits, and your social skills to navigate the wilderness and the challenges of the heart. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. Content warning: Blood, drowning

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-CONMAR-07 Impelled Reflections
scenarios.author: Casper Akto Kanstrup, Martin Akto Kanstrup
scenarios.blurb: The Archfey of Marocaro, Nite Lemos have summoned you to a personal audience. This is a great honor and you are to travel to The Tree near Oar's Rest to meet with his minion Gly Jever.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-CONMAR-09 Sweet Dreams
scenarios.author: Karianne Fog Heen
scenarios.blurb: Grandma Cookie’s honeybees have swarmed, and she needs help in getting them back to their hive. Are you ready for a wild chase in the Feywild? A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 2. CONTENT WARNING: Cannibalism (mention), sugar

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-CONMAR-15 Salvaging the Story
scenarios.author: Martine Lassen
scenarios.blurb:
Yarnspinner’s book has gone missing! This important task needs to be addressed.

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

CONTENT WARNINGS: spiders

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-DCAF01B Barangay Bound
scenarios.author: Adrian Francisco
scenarios.blurb:
It’s time for Ali to follow her dream and head to the next big town, Barangay. But the Encanta Forest is far too dangerous to traverse by oneself. Do you mind helping the young pixie move?

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-DCAF01 Pixie Dreams
scenarios.author: Adrian Francisco
scenarios.blurb:
An intrepid pixie resolves to leave the safety of the mangrove trees and visit the town of Barangay. Convincing her mother is one thing but completing her Rite to Flight is another! Can the adventurers help begin her journey?

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

This adventure takes place in Maykanta, a Domain of Delight.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-DCAF02 Harengon Harana
scenarios.author: Adrian Francisco
scenarios.blurb:
A young harengon boy wants to use music to compete for the archfey’s attention. But he needs the perfect guitar to do so. Can you help build the ultimate instrument?

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-DMMC-01 The Solitude of Solace
scenarios.author: Shu Qing Tan
scenarios.blurb: A little girl, seeking a cure for her dying mother, is lost. Your mission: find her and bring her home… but can you? Can you face the horror that awaits you in the depths of despair? A 4-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: This is not a whimsical Feywild adventure. This adventure features elements of psychological horror that may not be appropriate for young children and may trigger unpleasant states. This adventure contains; body horror, child endangerment (mention), gore, and mental health (abuse, depression, grief, and trauma).

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-FDC-01 The Ember King
scenarios.author: Bianca Bickford
scenarios.blurb: The Tavern of the Ember King appears during the Feast of the Moon in an alleyway in Waterdeep. The tavern is the hospitable domain of the pixies who spark embers in campfires. New adventurers can go here to begin their journey in the Feywild, and veteran adventurers meet inside for drinks and stories. Coin isn’t needed here – food and drink can be purchased for a tale. For new Feywild explorers, the benevolent Ember King offers advice and their first adventure in exchange for the tale of their exploits. Once agreed, the now pixie-sized party finds themselves at the top of the tavern and have one hour to find their way to the bottom. A two-hour adventure for level one characters (APL 1), part of the Dungeoncraft Spotlight program with guidelines found in the Domains of Delight supplement. Adventure through the Feywild in the Dungeoncraft Spotlight program for D&D Adventurers League Season 11! Experience the chaos and wonder of the Domains of Delight in this 9-adventure anthology for Tier 1 adventurers. These adventures highlight unique stories which can be played in any order.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-FDC-03 I Find That Familiar
scenarios.author: Paul Gabat
scenarios.blurb: This is a disaster! Spellcasters all over the realm cannot summon their fey familiars. Something must’ve happened in Paliparan, the Domain of Delight where a lot of fey creatures go before they get summoned using the find familiar spell. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 2. CONTENT WARNING: Gambling, animal harm, fey curses, child imprisonment, illness, loss of a friend

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-FDC-04 The Monster of Wonderia
scenarios.author: Anthony Joyce
scenarios.blurb: The adventure takes place in the new Feywild Domain of Delight, Wonderia, a magical land where childlike fey creatures called wonderfey live. In this adventure, the characters are summoned to Wonderia by wonderfey. The wonderfey ask the characters to serve as their guardians during their journey to the Forbidden Mountain where it is rumored the Monster of Wonderia lives. A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-FDC-05 Crumbling Castles & Candy Clouds
scenarios.author: Emily Harmon
scenarios.blurb: CONTENT WARNING: Earthquakes, Falling, Food The legendary city of Castamella, held aloft by cotton candy clouds, has meandered peacefully across the skies of the Feywild for time immemorial. But when its spires suddenly begin to crumble and crash through the sky below, only the adventurers stand between this idyllic haven and certain destruction. As factions coalesce in a battle that reaches beyond the borders of the sky, you must delve into the saccharine underbelly of this Seelie society to discover the culprits and stop their deliciously evil plans. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3. Adventure through the Feywild in the First Day Content program for D&D Adventurers League Season 11! Experience the chaos and wonder of the Domains of Delight in this 9-adventure anthology for Tier 1 adventurers. These adventures highlight unique stories which can be played in any order.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-FDC-06 The Landscape of Estorian LeFae
scenarios.author: Gabe Hicks
scenarios.blurb:
Canvas is a self-contained domain inside of a painting, protected by magic and housing secrets to be hidden in plain sight although, in a place of art and creation, anything can become reality, and that in itself is dangerous as the ruler is a bit eclectic. This Domain of Pigment is located inside of a painting drawn of a large tree covered in moss, raised on the ground, and with water flowing out of the base forming a small waterfall. It is labelled "Season's Fleetings" by Estorian LeFae.

Adventure through the Feywild in the Dungeoncraft Spotlight program for D&D Adventurers League Season 11! Experience the chaos and wonder of the Domains of Delight in this 9-adventure anthology for Tier 1 adventurers. These adventures highlight unique stories which can be played in any order.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-FDC-07 A Meal to Remember
scenarios.author: Justice Arman
scenarios.blurb: Content Warnings: grief, memory loss Forough Khanom (foe-ROOGH KHAH-noom), an elderly resident of Dwindle, is preparing an elaborate feast for a much anticipated visitor—the memory of her beloved late husband, who visits her once each year around the time of their anniversary. However, she awoke this morning to find her vegetable garden mysteriously trampled! Forough asks the characters to brave the dunes in search of ingredients from an oasis known as the Sabzi Knoll. She fears that if she offers her visitor a meager spread, he may never show. "A Meal to Remember" is a two-hour adventure for 1st through 4th-level characters part of the Dungeoncraft Spotlight Program using the new mechanics found in "Domains of Delight: A Feywild Accessory" supplement.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-FDC-08 The Great Toy Escape
scenarios.author: Jacky Leung
scenarios.blurb: An escaped toy named Taranath Brykas seeks help from the characters to rescue another trapped toy from the Archfey of the Joy Shop, the Joysmith. Upon arrival, the world is magnified and larger than life and the characters. Time is of the essence, a prospective archfey customer is set to arrive soon, but also the Joy Shop's curse also gradually transforms any trespassers into future toy products. "The Great Toy Escape" is a four-hour adventure for 1st through 4th-level characters part of the Dungeoncraft Spotlight Program using new mechanics found in the "Domains of Delight: A Feywild Accessory" supplement. Continue your journey through the Feywild by experiencing all the adventures from the Dungeoncraft Spotlight program! Experience the chaos and wonder of the new enchanting Domains of Delight for Tier 1 adventurers. These adventures highlight unique stories which can be played in any order.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-FDC-09 A Stitch in Time
scenarios.author: Kat Kruger
scenarios.blurb: The royal artificer, Hairspring, is on a very important mission to clear the clockwork passageways that lead to the central mechanism keeping the domain of Belleturnum alive. Ruled by the archfey, Queen Rosaura, the domain sprang into existence when a modron wandered through a fey crossing. Now the literal heart of the domain is at risk of collapse as nature attempts to entangle the clockworks. Visitors are challenged with logic, wordplay, and other puzzles, by some of the strangest and most peculiar creatures as they attempt to assist their guide in saving an entire domain. "A Stitch in Time" is a 4-hour adventure for 1st through 4th-level characters part of the Dungeoncraft Spotlight Program using the new mechanics found in "Domains of Delight: A Feywild Accessory" supplement. Adventure through the Feywild in the Dungeoncraft Spotlight program for D&D Adventurers League Season 11! Experience the chaos and wonder of the Domains of Delight in this 9-adventure anthology for Tier 1 adventurers. These adventures highlight unique stories which can be played in any order.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-HF-01 Freed of Feeling
scenarios.author: Adam White
scenarios.blurb:
The domain of Hallowfen is a refuge for those seeking to flee the predations of other Archfey. Ruled over by Ob, the Magnanimous, those who come to Hallowfen are allowed to live unburdened by their past crimes, so long as they abide by Ob's rules. A hexblood by the name of Oona Chickenbiter has chosen to creatively interpret these rules, much to the detriment of the other denizens of Hallowfen. Your party, newly stranded in this strange land, are tasked with rescuing a few of her captives. 

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

CONTENT WARNING: Kidnapping, Theft of Emotions, Violence

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-JSH-CEL1 Better with Friends
scenarios.author: Jeremiah Strangeheart
scenarios.blurb:
Dungeons, Dragons, Destiny, Doom... Sometimes it all gets to be a bit too much. And sometimes, you need to stop and celebrate the people around you.

A Two-Hour Birthday Celebration Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-JSH-LIB-01 Inter-Library Interception
scenarios.author: Jeremiah Strangeheart
scenarios.blurb: A Feywild librarian is fretting over missing books - and needs the characters to help her track them down! This adventure is the starting point for the series Adventures in Librarianship. A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 2. CONTENT WARNING: Insects and arachnids; book burning.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-KCB-03 In Vulnerability
scenarios.author: Brian Collier
scenarios.blurb:
The second adventure set in Shoreline, one of the Domains of Delight in the Feywild.

The party is involved in a wild magic incident that leaves them with a vulnerability to specific damage types.  A remedy exists in the town of Portland.  But they’ll need to quest to get it.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

This quick romp is perfect for convention play.  The two hour timeframe can be padded to allow time for role play while still wrapping up in plenty of time to take care of bookkeeping and allowing players to get to their next event.

Included in the download is a one-page history of Shoreline and its Archfey, Admiral Heron "Stone-Eye" Whaler and a map of Shoreline.

Content Awareness: Storms, Sea Travel, Confined Spaces, Unseen Attackers, Deception

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-KCB-05 Fishing in the Dark
scenarios.author: Brian Collier
scenarios.blurb:
When an adventure hook presents itself, adventurers put it all on the line.  It’s just what they do.

You meet at a tav—Wait a second. The Tavern is closed?  A note on the door indicates the barkeep is begging for adventurers to rescue him from bandits who have kidnapped him and are hiding deep in a cave.  Clearly, there is more is going on beneath the surface.  However, the townsfolk have already begun crowdfunding the rescue of their beloved barkeep.  So it looks like you’ve got to take the bait, no matter how fishy this seems.

This Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 play is optimized for five level 3 characters.

Phobia Advisory: Spiders, darkness, confined spaces

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-MPOP-01 Out on a Limb
scenarios.author: Michelle Churchill
scenarios.blurb:
Someone has taken the portal keys to the Multi Planar Orthotics and Prosthetics Center, and they must be retrieved before operation are further disrupted.

After spending the night in a haunted manor the adventuring party finds themselves in an unusual place. Can they put their best foot forward and help Gemma and Talbert recover the missing portal keys, or will the unusual magic of the Feywild leave them without a leg to stand on?

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

CONTENT WARNING: heath care setting, amputation (mention), prosthetics, and spiders.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-NBDD-01 Play the Game
scenarios.author: Robbie Pleasant
scenarios.blurb: The Archfey Yuverion has announced a new competition, where competitors face off in a series of games for the chance to win gold and amazing prizes. Of course, not everyone is there with the best of intentions. Can you prove yourself the lord of games and stop the evil machinations that are afoot? A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-NBDD-02 15 Seconds to Curtain
scenarios.author: Robbie Pleasant
scenarios.blurb:
A most sensational, inspirational, celebrational, momentational Dungeoncraft adventure.

Deep in the Feywild, a group of outcasts and oddballs need to put on a show. And you're their very special guests!

A two-hour adventure for tier 1 characters. Optimized for APL 3.

Content Warning: Anxiety (stage fright)

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-NJ-COU-01 Dear Aery
scenarios.author: Lee Ning Jiang
scenarios.blurb:
A voice in your dreams sends you on a journey to discover what resides in the heart of one who was left behind. What role will you play in this?

A Four -Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-PHP-01 Pot Luck!
scenarios.author: Miguel Luis de Jesus
scenarios.blurb:
A bakery in crisis, a missing chef, a festival....and a dragon?!
How did Ylraphon's renowned baker and chef, Cordon Ramses happened to just simply walk out of town and disappear?

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-PHP-LCL-01 A Cure for Freedom
scenarios.author: Joie Del Rosario
scenarios.blurb: A determined elf man seeks a potent cure for any curse, but it lies in the dangerous Forest of Water Lilies. Will the adventurers successfully retrieve it? A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Body horror, death, imprisonment

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-PHP-LCL 02 A Mystical Whimsy
scenarios.author: Joie Del Rosario
scenarios.blurb: A simple delivery quest goes awry and the adventurers find themselves stuck in the Feywild. Will they find a way back before the recipient becomes impatient? A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8. CONTENT WARNING: Mystical Mayhem!

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-PHP-POLAR-01 Snow Ice
scenarios.author: Franz Bedonia
scenarios.blurb: A contract for a magical study appears in front of the adventurers and after signing it, they find themselves in a mysterious tower. Do they have the wits to escape? A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 10. CONTENT WARNING: Abduction, Imprisonment, Loss

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-PHP-POLAR-02 You've Goat to be Kidding Me
scenarios.author: Franz Bedonia
scenarios.blurb:
A human farmer has lost his favorite goat and needs help finding it!
They just need to venture into the Cormanthor Forest.
A simple job for skilled adventurers,
nothing can go wrong… right?

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

CONTENT WARNING: Animal Cruelty, Body Horror, Deceit, Trickery, Leprechauns, Trypophobia

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ROOK-1-1 The Care and Maintenance of the Rookery
scenarios.blurb: A lost nature preserve has been rediscovered! Help its new caretaker secure and restore its once glorious Bastion of Rebirth, so examination of the demiplane can begin. The Rookery is a magical tome containing a feywild demiplane dedicated to the preservation and rehabilitation of endangered species. The land inside consists of several islands containing diverse habitats such that any creature needing care had terrain similar to home. Once the species recovered or flourished, they were reintroduced to their native plane. Unfortunately, before the domain truly flourished, the book along with an entire Fey queen’s library was banned and then lost. It was ultimately forgotten, and the land within it left to its own devices for many hundreds of years. As time passed, the original monitoring facilities became a forgotten ruin on a distant island. It has recently been rediscovered and its new caretaker need assistance rebuilding the former Visitor's Center so he can use it to base his operations out of as he investigates what has happened in the demiplane all the centuries it was neglected. A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 2.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-SQT-01 Hollyphant Love Medley
scenarios.author: Shu Qing Tan
scenarios.blurb:
The Red Hollyphant cabaret needs your skills and talents. It is up to you to make opening night a success. However, things are not what they seem. Will you choose love, or will you sell out?

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-SSM-01 The Grimm Reality
scenarios.author: Scott Moore
scenarios.blurb:
A previously unknown relative needs your assistance at a family reunion to locate a missing
family member.
Kind of.
Oh, and it’s on another plane.

Enjoy a fun romp through a baker's dozen of Grimm's Fairy Tales in an attempt to rescue a relative that you never knew you had, with the assistance of a family you never knew you had!

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-TBLCMB-03 The Black Lily Contract
scenarios.author: Matt Brown
scenarios.blurb: Mwynhad, the famous Feywild resort, offers off site excursions to the Morlyndu Lagoon. Now, dangerous events threaten the weekly trips. A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-TLRMB-02 The Last Resort
scenarios.author: Matt Brown
scenarios.blurb:
For years, Mwynhad was famous as a Feywild resort for relaxation and refreshment. Now terrible events are unfolding at the resort and adventurers are needed to solve the mystery.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 2.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-TMP-01 Buck Wild!
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets, Zach Barton
scenarios.blurb:
Are you ready to get Buck Wild?

The Archfey Dyul went hunting and caught more than he bargained for.
The villagers of Plentivale don't know what happened to their Archfey, and the domain is becoming more dangerous.
Loud barking from the fog makes it hard to sleep. Strange creatures prowl the woods.
Who can stop this incessant howling and find the Archfey?

The first in the Temporius trilogy.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

CONTENT WARNING: Body Horror, Death, Environment (freezing), Phobia (confined space)

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-TMP-02 Bucking the Trend
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets
scenarios.blurb:
The future is looking bleak in Temporius.
The Archfey Dyul is in hiding.
The forests are filled with the Ancient Evil's minions.
Even the stream that brings life to the village of Plentivale is corrupted!
It's time to start Bucking the Trend.
Who will brave the roiling stream, find the druids, and purify the source of corruption?

The second in the Temporius trilogy.
A stand-alone Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 7.

CONTENT WARNING: Body Horror, Extreme Environment (magic), Gore (handling a dead
animal), Grief, Loss

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-TMP-03 The Buck Stops
scenarios.author: Bryan Mets, Zach Barton
scenarios.blurb:
If you didn't think things could get worse for the domain, think again.
Its time to end this once and for all.
Today, the Buck Stops. Or You Do.

The finale of the Temporius trilogy.
A stand-alone Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 9.

CONTENT WARNING: Body Horror, Death, Extreme Environment (fire), Gore, Loss

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-TRI-01 Strike a Pose
scenarios.author: Noah Grand, The Role Initiative
scenarios.blurb:
Did you know gems can be exchanged for goods and services? Adventurers arrive in The Living Mine just as the archfey Mitali learns this, and she expects payback for all the gems she has given away.

A Two Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-TRI-02 Nothing Ventured
scenarios.author: James Repass, The Role Initiative
scenarios.blurb:
Adventures must work to track down a missing shopkeeper who has become trapped in her own shop, after a bargain with a powerful archfey has gone awry.

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-TST-01 Color in Light
scenarios.author: Aileen Adriane Cerrudo
scenarios.blurb:
Underneath the blue skies and bright yellow sun, a colorless village can be found. Music and color are lost in a small village near Kryptgarden forest and characters must travel to the Feywild to find answers. 

A Two to Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8

CONTENT WARNING: Grief, trauma, loss

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-UCON-01 The Party that Split
scenarios.author: Daniel Chapman
scenarios.blurb:
The village's children have gone missing from a birthday party, the only thing that was left behind was a note saying "Your move, Adventurers -- MS."

Has the mysterious stranger struck again? Where did the children go, and will you be able to return them?

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 characters, Optimized for APL 3.

Content Warnings: Children in Peril, kidnapping

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-UCON-02 Have You No Heart?
scenarios.author: Daniel Chapman
scenarios.blurb:
The Party that Split is a standalone adventure set in the peculiar village of Basht. Olivia Alfera calls the party back to Basht to help Robin Goodman reunite a girl with her father.

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 characters, Optimized for APL 3.

Content Warnings: Grief, Loss of a Relative, Memory Loss

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-VACONS-01 Welcome to Fablerise
scenarios.author: Eddie Gioffre
scenarios.blurb:
After setting out for adventure, the heroes find themselves caught up in a violent storm. They awaken in a strange new realm, with the chance to explore, make new friends, and maybe a few enemies. But will it be enough for them to find their way home...

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 1.
CONTENT WARNING: Violence against animals

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-WRT-00 Writer's Block
scenarios.author: Michelle Churchill
scenarios.blurb:
In an effort to finish a submission for the Feywild Fantastical Fiction Competition one writer has unwittingly pulled in three unsuspecting strangers and their beloved pets into Fablerise. The lost must be found, and can the characters prevent the same fate from befalling another?

This is a 2 hour Tier 2 Adventurer Optimized for APL 6.

CONTENT WARNING: Loss of pet, loss of family members, financial instability, slaughter of animals (mentioned), loss of home, confiscation of property, and spiders.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ZEP-T1S1 Dragon-bard's Christmas Carol
scenarios.author: Zardak123
scenarios.blurb:
The famous College of Bards in the Feywild realm of Zep is putting on a play and they need you!
A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ZODIAC-00 Luna Park
scenarios.author: Steven Truong
scenarios.blurb:
Once every eight years, the fantastic Luna Carnival touches down on your world, bringing joy to one settlement after the next. Its owner, Mistress Lunafreya, knows how to put on a good show. But there’s more to this magical extravaganza than meets the eye! The carnival is a gateway to a fantastic Feywild domain unlike anything found on the Material Plane. The carnival is in chaos and needs brave adventurers to resolve the problems plaguing the attractions and the carnival folk.


Prologue of the Zodiac Tales

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 2.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ZODIAC-01 The Pied Piper and the Rat King
scenarios.author: Steven Truong
scenarios.blurb:
The common folk of the village blame the Carnival for their missing children. A pied piper has stolen the children into the Feywild. Save the children, prove the carnival’s innocence.

Story 1 of the Zodiac Tales

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 2.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ZODIAC-02 Udder Chaos, The Holy Cowspiracy
scenarios.author: Steven Truong
scenarios.blurb:
Journey to Samsara, the Feywild's Domain of Delight, a realm of Rewards, Reincarnation and Fortune.

Inspired by The Myths of the Lunar New Year and the Animals of the Eastern Zodiac.

Journey to the Domain of Delight, Samsara and explore the mystery of the Honey Milk Village.

The denizens of Samsara have lost contact with the village of Honey Milk, adventurers are hired to solve the conspiracy, and find the missing archfey of Samsara.

A sinister mystery and delve into the undeground labyrinth in the Feywild.

The Feywild: The Domain of Delight, Samsara.
An adventure for adventurers to reach the magical feywild. The Domain of Delight, Samsara is unique in that it is ruled by thirteen powerful Archfey that share this domain. These Archfey are known as the Zodiac XIII. 
Adventurers will have opportunity to meet one of the archfeys of Samsara, The Herder.

Story 2 of the Zodiac Tales

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

Domain of Delight: Samsara

 Adventure by Steven Truong

CONTENT ADVISORY: Agoraphobia, Bovine Beasts, Destruction and a Labyrinth.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ZODIAC-03 Revenge of the Rakshasa
scenarios.author: Steven Truong
scenarios.blurb:
An archfey of Samsara, The Maharani has decreed that any suitor that completes the challenges and retrieves the treasure hidden in the Golden Desert of Samsara will win her beloved daughters’ service and a pact with the archfey herself. However forces in the shadows await for opportunities to strike.

The Feywild: The Domain of Delight, Samsara.

An adventure for adventurers to reach the magical feywild. The Domain of Delight, Samsara is unique in that it is ruled by thirteen powerful Archfey that share this domain. These Archfey are known as the Zodiac XIII. Explore the Golden Desert, and The Golden lands of the Jewel Oasis and Golden Temple.

Story 3 of the Zodiac Tales

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.

scenarios.name: WBW-DC-ZODIAC-04 The Jade Hare
scenarios.author: Steven Truong
scenarios.blurb:
The Usagi clan has been stricken with misfortune and are unable to complete the quest of their patron archfey, The Jade Hare. The clan has hired you and your fellow adventurers; however forces in the shadows wish to sabotage this sacred task and obtain the magical ingredients for their own nefarious purposes.

Story 4 of the Zodiac Tales

A Four-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

scenarios.name: WBW-PR Lost Things
scenarios.author: Travis Woodall, Stacey Allan, Will Doyle
scenarios.blurb:
Like a half-forgotten dream, the Witchlight Carnival drifts into our world once every eight
years, drawing folk of all ages to delight in its fey wonders. Entry without a ticket is strictly
forbidden, and the consequences for trespass echo through time.
A two-hour prelude adventure for players The Wild Beyond the Witchlight campaign.
Characters created as a part of the adventure.
CONTENT WARNING: Fairytale abduction, magical charm

scenarios.name: Wrath and Glory
scenarios.blurb: A demo game of Wrath and Glory. I can run up to 6 players. This is the warhammer 40k sifi dark Gothic game. I was going to try and do this 4/6/2019 at noon. You don't need anything but your self and if you got some d6's you like.

scenarios.name: Zib for your Thoughts
scenarios.author: Chris Tulach
scenarios.blurb:
One person’s trash is sometimes another’s treasure. In this case, it’s also an opportunity for you to go
on an excursion across the Tenth District, tracking down a client’s very specific request… in thoughts.

The second adventure of the series designed to introduce players to the Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica, this continues the story introduced in Krenko's Way. Prior knowledge of that adventure is not required.
